item.title: Report E-2024050639
item.description:
Report E-2024050639

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-10
  • City: PORT ALLEN
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 1/2-gallon of F73XX Production Bake Enamel with PHX Colorants GREY RAL 7035 was released from one 1-gallon plastic can, impacting 2 boxes each containing 3 containers of the same product and the trailer floor, likely due to not being strapped in properly prior to arrival. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the terminal, who stated they will clean the spill with absorbent and place the contents into a 30-gallon poly drum for disposal.

item.title: Report E-2024050661
item.description:
Report E-2024050661

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-30T18:16:39+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-05-01
  • City: SHREVEPORT
  • State: LA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO Logistics
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO-LSL contacted ERTS to report a spill of about 20 fluid ounces of Gasoline from one 114fl.oz. metal canister onto the dock floor. The canister was damaged in a forklift accident on the LSL dock
